description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，河北井陉人，汉族。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, with ancestral roots in Jingxing, Hebei.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 梁兵是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liang Bing is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，梁兵被选为河南省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Liang Bing was elected as a deputy from Henan Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 梁兵是中华人民共和国公民。
description.en: Liang Bing is a citizen of the People's Republic of China.
